title: Kylie Jenner KISSES best friend Stassie as girls reenact Britney Spears and Madonna's famous peck
text:
They turned a few heads while celebrating Halloween a few days early.

And Kylie Jenner looked every inch like Madonna from the MTV Video Music Awards in 2003 as she stepped out with her counterpart Stassie Karanikolaou who was dressed to thrill in a Britney Spears costume.

The 22-year-old billionaire got so into the costume that she leaned into her gal pal and reenacted the popstar's famous kiss.

Friends forever: Kylie Jenner looked every inch like Madonna from the MTV Video Music Awards in 2003 as she stepped out with her counterpart Stassie Karanikolaou who was dressed to thrill in a Britney Spears costume

Kylie pranced around the room wearing an all-black ensemble complete with a tight tank top and long wrist warmers.

Her curvy waistline was on display in a pair of black trousers with a delicate silver chain across her hips.

The cosmetics queen added inches to her petite frame with a pair of black boots and carried a microphone in one hand to sing a few classic Madonna songs.

Like a Virgin: The 22-year-old billionaire got so into the costume that she leaned into her gal pal and reenacted the popstar's famous kiss

Crazy for You: The cosmetics queen added inches to her petite frame with a pair of black boots and carried a microphone in one hand to sing a few classic Madonna songs

Stassie played her part wearing a high-waisted, white satin mini skirt with ruffles along her thigh.

Her ample assets were barely contained in a lace bustier, with a slew of silver chains running down into a plunging neckline.

The ladies danced and lip-synched to Madonna's Like A Virgin before Kylie threw her arm around her pal and went in for the kiss.

A moment! Audiences were stunned in 2003 when the Material Girl kissed Britney before swapping spit with Christina Aguilera at the MTV Video Music Awards

Like a Prayer: Kylie pranced around the room wearing an all-black ensemble complete with a tight tank top and long wrist warmers

Audiences were stunned in 2003 when the Material Girl kissed Britney before swapping spit with Christina Aguilera at the MTV Video Music Awards.

Kylie and Stassie have been nearly inseparable after a challenging start to the year when her best friend Jordyn Woods revealed she kissed Khloe Kardashian's love-rat boyfriend Tristan Thompson at a house party in Los Angeles on Valentine's Day weekend.

While Tristan had previously been caught up in multiple cheating scandals — DailyMail.com broke the news of his affairs just days before she gave birth to their daughter True — this infidelity was the last straw for Khloe and she ended things with the professional basketball player for good.

Khloe recently admitted in a Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer that she misses her ex-husband, former NBA player Lamar Odom, 'all the time.'
description: The 22-year-old billionaire got so into the costume that she leaned into her gal pal and reenacted the popstar's famous kiss.
